title: #30 State of the Housewives
itunes:title: #30 State of the Housewives
itunes:subtitle: Danny continues the #RHOBH conversation with VIEW co-host Meghan McCain. Meghan offers her perspective on the season of The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, her feud with Teddi, and her love of Joy Behar. Danny also breaks down everything that's ...
description:
Danny continues the #RHOBH conversation with VIEW co-host Meghan McCain. Meghan offers her perspective on the season of The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, her feud with Teddi, and her love of Joy Behar. Danny also breaks down everything that's happening with Teri Hatcher, including an EXCLUSIVE interview with someone who went to her recent garage sale. Plus, Danny chats about Nailed It! on Netflix, the RuPaul's Drag Race finale, and much more! 

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/PellegrinoDanny

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino

Instagram: www.Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino

Website: www.EverythingIconic.com

*Produced by Whitney Fromholtz

*Artwork by Matthew Burgess


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
